title: Eloquent JavaScript, Third Edition
subtitle: A Modern Introduction to Programming
author: Marijn Haverbeke
description: JavaScript lies at the heart of almost every modern web application, from social apps like Twitter to browser-based game frameworks like Phaser and Babylon. Though simple for beginners to pick up and play with, JavaScript is a flexible, complex language that you can use to build full-scale applications.

title: Practical Modern JavaScript
subtitle: Dive into ES6 and the Future of JavaScript
author: Nicolás Bevacqua
description: To get the most out of modern JavaScript, you need learn the latest features of its parent specification, ECMAScript 6 (ES6). This book provides a highly practical look at ES6, without getting lost in the specification or its implementation details.

title: Understanding ECMAScript 6
subtitle: The Definitive Guide for JavaScript Developers
author: Nicholas C. Zakas
description: ECMAScript 6 represents the biggest update to the core of JavaScript in the history of the language. In Understanding ECMAScript 6, expert developer Nicholas C. Zakas provides a complete guide to the object types, syntax, and other exciting changes that ECMAScript 6 brings to JavaScript.

title: Speaking JavaScript
subtitle: An In-Depth Guide for Programmers
author: Axel Rauschmayer dr.
description: Like it or not, JavaScript is everywhere these days -from browser to server to mobile- and now you, too, need to learn the language or dive deeper than you have. This concise book guides you into and through JavaScript, written by a veteran programmer who once found himself in the same position.

title: Learning JavaScript Design Patterns
subtitle: A JavaScript and jQuery Developer's Guide
author: Addy Osmani
description: With Learning JavaScript Design Patterns, you'll learn how to write beautiful, structured, and maintainable JavaScript by applying classical and modern design patterns to the language. If you want to keep your code efficient, more manageable, and up-to-date with the latest best practices, this book is for you.

title: You Don't Know JS Yet
subtitle: Get Started
author: Kyle Simpson
description: The worldwide best selling You Don't Know JS book series is back for a 2nd edition: You Don't Know JS Yet. All 6 books are brand new, rewritten to cover all sides of JS for 2020 and beyond.

title: Pro Git
subtitle: Everything you neeed to know about Git
author: Scott Chacon and Ben Straub
description: Pro Git (Second Edition) is your fully-updated guide to Git and its usage in the modern world. Git has come a long way since it was first developed by Linus Torvalds for Linux kernel development. It has taken the open source world by storm since its inception in 2005, and this book teaches you how to use it like a pro.

title: Rethinking Productivity in Software Engineering
author: Edited by: Caitlin Sadowski, Thomas Zimmermann
description: Get the most out of this foundational reference and improve the productivity of your software teams. This open access book collects the wisdom of the 2017 "Dagstuhl" seminar on productivity in software engineering, a meeting of community leaders, who came together with the goal of rethinking traditional definitions and measures of productivity.

title: Addition and Subtraction
subtitle: (Grades 1 - 2)
author: Kate Cole
description: This teacher-approved Step Ahead workbook from Golden Books is a great guide to addition and subtraction for 1st and 2nd graders--now in a deluxe edition with twice the pages and over 70 colorful stickers. Perfect for back to school--no matter what that looks like!

title: The Sentinel
subtitle: The world's number one bestseller
author: Lee and Andrew Child
description: Jack Reacher gets off the bus in a sleepy no-name town outside Nashville, Tennessee. He plans to grab a cup of coffee and move right along. Not going to happen...

title: Savršen plan
subtitle: No plan B
author: Lee Child i Andrew Child
description: U gradiću Gerrardsvilleu u Coloradu nepoznata žena stradala je u naletu autobusa. Svi svjedoci tvrde da se radi o samoubojstvu. Ali Jack Reacher je jedini vidio što se doista dogodilo.

title: Dune
subtitle: Spice must flow
author: Frank Herbert
description: In 1965, after being rejected by more than a dozen publishing houses, a book called Dune was brought out by the Chilton Book Company. Its respected author, journalist Frank Herbert, had written Dune with nothing more in mind than to entertain his readers with the telling of a particularly complex story, one which had occupied his thoughts for more than six years. No one - not Herbert, not Chilton, not the science fiction community at the time - had any idea that Dune would be adopted and read by successive generations with a fervor bordering on cult worship. Or that it would prove to be merely the first of what have now become five international bestsellers about a desert world of the future - the planet Arrakis, called Dune.
category: beletristika sf science fiction znanstvena fantastika roman književnost

title: A Girls'S Guide To Moving On
subtitle: A Novel, Kindle Edition
author: Debbie Macomber
description: A mother and her daughter-in-law both leave unhappy marriages and take up with new men.

title: How to Catch a Dinosaur
subtitle: From the New York Times
author: Adam Wallace; Andy Elkerton (ilustrator)
description: Join the daring How to Catch Kids as they try to wrangle a dinosaur in time for the school science fair and prove they're still around!
category: djeca i mladi slikovnice priče književnost

title: Natural History
subtitle: The Ultimate Visual Guide to Everything on Earth
author: DK, Smithsonian Institution (Contributor)
description: A beautiful guide to Earth's wildlife and natural history, including its rocks, minerals, animals, plants, fungi, microorganisms and more!

title: Britannica Encyclopedia of World Religions
subtitle: Illustrated
author: Inc Encyclopedia Britannica; Wendy Doniger (Editor)
description: This single-volume encyclopedia contains over 5,100 entries on religious movements and concepts, historical and legendary figures, divinities and supernatural characters, and important religious places.

title: The Merriam-Webster Dictionary
subtitle: America`s Best-Selling Dictionary
author: Merriam-Webster
description: A revised and updated kindle edition of the best-selling dictionary covering core vocabulary with over a hundred new entries and senses.

title: NOVI RJEČNIK STRANIH RIJEČI
subtitle: Klaićev rječnik
author: Bratoljub Klaić
description: Bratoljub Klaić, kroatist, leksikograf i prevoditelj, podario je hrvatskoj leksikografiji Rječnik stranih riječi koji je obilježio drugu polovicu 20. stoljeća na hrvatskom prostoru i u široj regiji.

title: Znanost začina
subtitle: Otkrijte kako se okusi stapaju i pokrenite revoluciju u kuhanju
author: Stuart Farrimond dr.
description: Ljubitelji začina, pustolovi i znatiželjni kuhari, podignite svoju strast prema začinima na novu razinu zahvaljujući zanimljivim istraživanjima dr. Stuarta Farrimonda, znanstvenika o prehrani i uspješnog autora. Svladajte znanost koja se skriva iza kulinarske umjetnosti stapanja začinskih mješavina te naučite kako spojevi koji tvore okus(e) začina u novim kombinacijama stvaraju drukčije arome i osjete.

title: Ježeva kućica
subtitle: Po šumi, širom, bez staze, puta, Ježurka Ježić povazdan luta
author: Branko Ćopić, Vilko Gilha Selan (ilustracije)
description: Najslavniji jež dolazi vam u obnovljenome ruhu! Prisjetite se svojega djetinjstva i upoznajte djecu s vrhunskim ilustracijama Vilka Glihe Selana i predivnim stihovima Branka Ćopića za ljepši dan i miran san.
category: djeca i mladi slikovnice priče poezija književnost

title: Pride and Prejudice
subtitle: A Novel In Three Volumes
author: Jane Austen
description: Pride and Prejudice is Jane Austen's most perennially popular novel. The love story of Elizabeth Bennet and Fitzwilliam Darcy, who misjudge, then challenge and change each other, is also a novel about the search for happiness and self- knowledge in a world of strict social rules, where a woman must marry well to survive.

title: SPQR: A History of Ancient Rome
subtitle: New York Times Bestseller
author: Mary Beard
description: A sweeping, -magisterial- history of the Roman Empire from one of our foremost classicists shows why Rome remains -relevant to people many centuries later-.

title: Knowledge Encyclopedia: World History
subtitle: (Knowledge Encyclopedia For Children)
author: Wonder House Books
description: When and where did the first civilisations emerge? How did Britain lead the Industrial Revolution? What was the Suffrage Movement? This encyclopedia will answer these and more hows and whats for you. Learning is made simpler with well-labelled diagrams and an extensive glossary of difficult words.

title: The Warrior's Apprentice - 30th Anniversary Edition
subtitle: A Miles Vorkosigan Saga Novel
author: Lois McMaster Bujold
description: Discharged from the Barrarayan academy after flunking the physical, a discouraged Miles Vorkosigan takes possession of a jumpship and becomes the leader of a mercenary force that expands to a fleet of treasonous proportions.
category: beletristika sf znanstvena fantastika science fiction roman
